explains: n. 移民（入境）；移民人数；移民局入境检查，移民局入境检查处
wordGroup: illegal immigration 非法移民；非法入境
immigration officer 移民局官员；入境关员
immigration status 移民身份；入境身份；在留资格
immigration act 移民法；移民法案
immigration official n. 移民局官员

sentences.en: He called for much stricter curbs on immigration.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁对移民实行更为严格的限制。

sentences.en: He was criticized for his tough stand on immigration.
sentences.cn: 他因在移民问题上立场强硬受到批评。

sentences.en: First, you have to go through immigration and customs.
sentences.cn: 首先你必须通过移民局和海关的检查。
